faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Marketing environment, tools, methods and general principles of creating strategies for product, pricing, distribution and promotion are examined. Internetmarketing.
description.et: Käsitletakse turunduse põhimõisteid ja kontseptsioone, turunduskeskkonda ja turunduse seost teiste ettevõtte valdkondadega. Antakse ülevaade turunduse infosüsteemi struktuurist ja tarbija ostukäitumisest. Sihtturgude valimine ja positsioneerimine. Turundus kompleks: toode, hind, jaotus ja edustus: olemus, eesmärgid, strateegiad. Internetiturundus

objectives.en: Students are able to understand basic knowledge and principles of marketing and  it' s connections with other areas of the company.
objectives.et: Õppijad omandavad alusteadmised turunduse olemusest, põhimõtetest ja seostest teiste ettevõtte tegevusvaldkondadega.

learning_outcomes.en: *understand basic concepts of marketing and knows how to associate it with other areas of the company;
learning_outcomes.et: * teab ja mõistab turunduse põhimõistete olemust ning omavahelist seost,

learning_outcomes.en: *understand the importance of the segmentation of customers;
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab seostada aines omandatud teadmisi teiste ettevõtte tegevusvaldkondadega,
* oskab esile tuua turunduse rolli ettevõtte edukas tegevuses ja arengus,
*mõistab turgude segmenteerimise vajalikkust ja sihtturgude kujundamise võimalusi,

learning_outcomes.en: *understand the importance of marketing ensuring the success of the company;
learning_outcomes.et: * teab, kuidas analüüsida ning kujundada terviklik turunduskompleks,

learning_outcomes.en: *use basic knowledge for further specialisation in marketing;
learning_outcomes.et: * on omandanud olulised baasteadmised edasiseks spetsialiseerumiseks turunduse valdkonnas;
* oskab rakendada omandatud teadmisi oma erialases töös.

notes.et:
The course can be taken fully online. There will be online test on Moodle based on all the main topics of the course. All slides and materials will be made available on Moodle. These materials will include either lecture videos, reading materials, or other video materials.
Depending on the topic, there will be short videos and/or lecture videos available for all topics to enable distance learning

independent_work.et:
Every student must be a member of a group 

Every grpup should carry out a marketing research and create or improve a product concept for specific market segment. Groups have to present their marketing research findings in interim seminar and their product concepts in final seminar.

description.et:
Kodutööd tehakse rühmades.
Idee - uuendusmeelsus, turuvajadus, turunduskursuse sobivus
Aruanne – ühtsus teooriaga, põhjalikkus, viitamine, vormistamine, tuginemine erinevatele allikatele, mõistlikkus
Kaitsekõne - atraktiivsus ja veenvus, oskus vastata küsimustele.

grade_evaluation.et:
maximum 100 points includes:
Group work - 20p
Written or oral exam - 60p
Moodle tests - 20p
Bonus points - 10p
You have an ability to get bonus points for being an active participant in the lectures, asking questions, discussing, challenging the ideas etc.

debt_elimination.et: Possible upon agreement with the lecturer

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.et: Introduction to the course; Introduction to Marketing (what is marketing, concepts, process), Explaining the main components of the course
Marketing environment (micro, macro) analysis - Liudmyla Dorokhova
Promotion strategy, Advertising and Public Relations, Segmentation
Marketing Project creation - first ideas, Groupwork online, Presenting rough concepts on Moodle
Workshop: Teamwork and team building. Circular economy (Guest speaker: Mayri Tiido)
Workshop: Teamwork and team building. Circular economy (Guest speaker: Mayri Tiido)
